(一) 惡劣天氣和其他特別情況
若活動期間，遇上惡劣天氣或其他特別情況，以致活動要臨時終止，老師將安排學生留在安全地方，待情況有所改善，才盡快讓學生返回家中。
如有查詢，請致電2461 1555與余靜雯老師聯絡。

Location: Room 311
Event: "Art Exchange Exhibition"

Time: 11:00-13:00
Location: School Auditorium
Dress Code: Neat School Uniform
(1) Adverse Weather and Other Special Conditions
If adverse weather or other special conditions occur during the event, causing it to be terminated abruptly, teachers will arrange for students to stay in a safe place until the situation improves, after which students will be sent home as soon as possible.
For inquiries, please contact Ms. Yu Jingwen at 2461 1555.
